citations.narrative:
The pigs were housed in enclosures with a solid back wall made of concrete and with side and front walls made of metal
fencing. The following housekeeping issues were noted during the inspection of the animal housing room. Many of the
enclosures were noted to have a build-up of large cobwebs and particulate debris on the surface of the back wall and on
the side/front walls, and there was also a build-up of large cobwebs and particulate debris present on the walls above the
enclosures.
Per this Section, premises housing animals shall be kept clean to facilitate the prescribed husbandry practices and to
protect the health of the animals. The housing room and the walls of the enclosures need to be cleaned and the level of
housekeeping in the area needs to be improved to facilitate prescribed housekeeping practices and for the health of the
animals. Correct by 8/20/24.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.
*END OF REPORT*
n

narrative:
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
The pigs were housed in enclosures with a solid back wall made of concrete and with side and front walls made of metal 
fencing. The following housekeeping issues were noted during the inspection of the animal housing room. Many of the 
enclosures were noted to have a build-up of large cobwebs and particulate debris on the surface of the back wall and on 
the side/front walls, and there was also a build-up of large cobwebs and particulate debris present on the walls above the 
enclosures.  
 
Per this Section, premises housing animals shall be kept clean to facilitate the prescribed husbandry practices and to 
protect the health of the animals. The housing room and the walls of the enclosures need to be cleaned and the level of 
housekeeping in the area needs to be improved to facilitate prescribed housekeeping practices and for the health of the 
animals. Correct by 8/20/24. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.  
 
*END OF REPORT* 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
